name: Terminal (itch) (Lake Shore Drive Games)
description:
Initializing system… accessing memory logs… error: memory corrupt.

New directive: escape the moving train.

As a prototype for a new form of artificial intelligence, you are activated on a train with no idea of where you are going or where you came from. But one thing is for certain: the people on the train are determined to make sure you make it to your destination.

Sneak past dangerous guards, avoid high-tech cameras, and take on other AI in this stealth-based action platformer!

Controls

WASD - Move

R - Restart level (during game over)

Credits
